home.heroTitle: IP is not a cost. It's valuation.
home.heroSubtitle1: Patents · Trademarks · Designs · Disputes · Technology Valuation
home.heroSubtitle2: All-in-one IP Services for Business Growth
home.clientsTitle2: partnering with MUST Patent Law Firm
home.clientsSubtitle: We strive to be a reliable partner you can always count on.

practiceAreas.metaDescription: From patent, trademark, and design filings to FTO analysis, licensing, and disputes — discover the specialized practice areas of MUST Patent Law Firm.
practiceAreas.heroSubtitle: Comprehensive professional services across all IP disciplines
practiceAreas.area1Desc: We handle the entire process from technology analysis and specification drafting to filing and examination responses.
practiceAreas.area2Desc: We support brand protection from trademark strategy development to registration.
practiceAreas.area3Desc: We legally protect product designs to secure competitive advantages.
practiceAreas.area4Desc: We analyze patent risks and review infringement possibilities before product launch.
practiceAreas.area5Desc: We support all aspects of IP-related contracts including technology transfers, licenses, and joint research agreements.
practiceAreas.area6Desc: We handle IP dispute representation from trials and litigation to invalidation and cancellation proceedings.

insights.metaDescription: Global license-out capabilities, technology listing preparation, and technology commercialization — discover the differentiated core competencies of MUST Patent Law Firm.
insights.heroSubtitle: The differentiated core competencies of MUST Patent Law Firm
insights.imageAlt: MUST Patent Law Firm Core Competencies
insights.item1Desc: We support global market entry through license-out strategy development and IP due diligence for international companies.
insights.item2Desc: We systematically support IP portfolio building, patent mapping, and technology valuation documentation for technology-based IPO listings.
insights.item3Desc: We provide one-stop IP strategy, contract review, and rights acquisition services for university/research institution technology transfers and corporate technology commercialization.
insights.item4Title: Senior Experts with 10+ Years of Experience
insights.item4Desc: Rather than delegating to juniors, our senior patent attorneys with over 10 years of practical experience personally handle filing, examination, and dispute work to ensure the highest quality.
insights.item5Title: Patent Work Aligned with Business Strategy
insights.item5Desc: Beyond simple filing services, we understand each client's business strategy and roadmap to design tailored IP portfolios and rights acquisition strategies.

attorneys.metaDescription: Meet the expert team at MUST Patent Law Firm. Our patent attorneys with 10+ years of experience personally handle all matters.

contact.metaTitle: Contact Us | MUST Patent Law Firm
contact.metaDescription: Contact us for consultations on patents, trademarks, designs, FTO, and more.
contact.title: Contact Us
contact.intro1: Thank you for visiting MUST Patent Law Firm.
contact.intro2: Please leave your inquiry and our patent attorney will respond promptly.
contact.autoReplyNote: * An auto-reply email will be sent after submission. Please check your spam folder if you don't see it.
contact.formSubtitle: Fill in the form below and our representative will contact you with a confirmation email.
contact.kakaoDesc: Chat with us 1:1 through the MUST Patent Law Firm KakaoTalk channel.
contact.kakaoNote: Inquiries outside business hours will be answered on the next business day.
contact.directions: 5 min walk from Munjeong Station (Line 8) Exit 3
